entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
